Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Level Description: Advanced (complete and accurate representation of all elements)

The student can depict the purpose of the device as a solution to the problem of communicating over a distance, suggesting an understanding of the problem-solving aspect.
The student can label the drawing appropriately to demonstrate the path of sound traveling from one student to the other through the device.
The student can effectively represent the significance of using such devices for communication over long distances, adding context to the drawing.
